parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.
The source address from which the vertex positions are to be copied.
The number of vertex positions to copy.

simplesect.para: The mesh storage will be implicitly resized (if needed) to provide storage for the number of meshes that is inferred from the specified index.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.
The source address from which the texture coordinates are to be copied.
The number of texture coordinates to copy.

simplesect.para: The mesh storage will be implicitly resized (if needed) to provide storage for the number of meshes that is inferred from the specified index.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.
The source address from which the normals are to be copied.
The number of normals to copy.

simplesect.para: The mesh storage will be implicitly resized (if needed) to provide storage for the number of meshes that is inferred from the specified index.

briefdescription.para: List of vertex layouts the belong to the specified mesh.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.
The source address from which the layouts are to be copied.
The number of layouts to copy.

simplesect.para: The mesh storage will be implicitly resized (if needed) to provide storage for the number of meshes that is inferred from the specified index.

briefdescription.para: Delete all lists of vertex layout indices for the specified mesh.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.

memberdef.argsstring: (std::uint16_t meshIndex, std::uint32_t faceIndex, const std::uint32_t *layoutIndices, std::uint32_t count)=0
memberdef.name: setFaceVertexLayoutIndices

briefdescription.para: Vertex layout indices that belong to the specified face.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.
A face's position in the zero-indexed array of faces that belong to the above referenced mesh.
The source address from which the layout indices are to be copied.

simplesect.para: The layout indices point into the array that is set through setVertexLayouts

parameterdescription.para: The number of vertices to copy.

simplesect.para: Both the mesh storage itself and it's face storage will be implicitly resized (if needed) to provide storage for the number of meshes and/or faces that are inferred from the specified indexes.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.
The maximum number of joints that may influence any single vertex.

briefdescription.para: Delete all skin weights for the specified mesh.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.

memberdef.argsstring: (std::uint16_t meshIndex, std::uint32_t vertexIndex, const float *weights, std::uint16_t count)=0
memberdef.name: setSkinWeightsValues

briefdescription.para: List of skin weights influencing the referenced vertex.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.
A position in the zero-indexed array of vertex positions.
The source address from which the weights are to be copied.
The number of weights to copy.

simplesect.para: Both the mesh storage itself and it's skin weight storage will be implicitly resized (if needed) to provide storage for the number of meshes and/or skin-weight lists that are inferred from the specified indexes.
The sum of weights must add up to 1.

memberdef.argsstring: (std::uint16_t meshIndex, std::uint32_t vertexIndex, const std::uint16_t *jointIndices, std::uint16_t count)=0
memberdef.name: setSkinWeightsJointIndices

briefdescription.para: List of joint indices associated with each skin weight for the specified vertex.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.
A position in the zero-indexed array of vertex positions.
The source address from which the joint indices are to be copied.
The number of joint indices to copy.

simplesect.para: Both the mesh storage itself and it's joint index list storage will be implicitly resized (if needed) to provide storage for the number of meshes and/or joint index lists that are inferred from the specified indexes.
The joint indices must be stored in the same order as the weights they are associated with.

briefdescription.para: Delete all blend shape targets for the specified mesh.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.

briefdescription.para: The matching blend shape channel index of the specified blend shape target.

simplesect.para: Associate the mesh-local blend shape target index with the absolute blend shape channel index as found in the Definition layer.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.
A position in the zero-indexed array of blend shape targets within the specified mesh.
The index of the specified blend shape channel in the Definition layer.

simplesect.para: Both the mesh storage itself and it's blend shape target storage will be implicitly resized (if needed) to provide storage for the number of meshes and/or blend shape targets that are inferred from the specified indexes.

memberdef.argsstring: (std::uint16_t meshIndex, std::uint16_t blendShapeTargetIndex, const Delta *deltas, std::uint32_t count)=0
memberdef.name: setBlendShapeTargetDeltas

briefdescription.para: List of deltas for each affected vertex.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.
A position in the zero-indexed array of blend shape targets within the specified mesh.
The source address from which the blend shape target deltas are to be copied.
The number of blend shape target deltas to copy.

simplesect.para: Both the mesh storage itself and it's blend shape target storage will be implicitly resized (if needed) to provide storage for the number of meshes and/or blend shape targets that are inferred from the specified indexes.

memberdef.argsstring: (std::uint16_t meshIndex, std::uint16_t blendShapeTargetIndex, const std::uint32_t *vertexIndices, std::uint32_t count)=0
memberdef.name: setBlendShapeTargetVertexIndices

briefdescription.para: Vertex position indices affected by the specified blend shape target.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.
A position in the zero-indexed array of blend shape targets within the specified mesh.
The source address from which the vertex position indices are to be copied.
The number of vertex position indices to copy.

simplesect.para: Both the mesh storage itself and it's blend shape target storage will be implicitly resized (if needed) to provide storage for the number of meshes and/or blend shape targets that are inferred from the specified indexes.
The vertex position indices must be stored in the same order as the deltas they are associated with.

briefdescription.para: Write-only accessors for the geometry data associated with a rig.

simplesect.para: Implementors should inherit from Writer itself and not this class.
